patthana8.45:1.1: Naajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.45:2.1: Nabāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca ajjhattikaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.45:3.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
